description: The dame shares her greatest fears and one of her biggest crushes.
title: Confirm or Deny: Judi Dench
title_page: Confirm or Deny: Judi Dench - The New York Times
maintext:
Maureen Dowd: You’re bored with playing queens?
Judi Dench: Yup, a bit.
You fear hordes of schoolchildren.
Confirm. I’m uneasy about gangs of schoolchildren. When we did “Notes on a Scandal,” the very first day was in a school and I was surrounded by children and I don’t know, it was frightening. (Laughs)
Your ideal man is Johnny Depp.
One of them.
You love embroidering rude cushions with bawdy language and giving them to your famous friends.
I used to do that a lot, but my eyesight doesn’t let me anymore. I found someone to make the cushions for me.
